name: Alien Mayhem
description: Alien Mayhem is an artificial open world sandbox game developed and created by Supa Serious. We simulate a what-if scenario where an alien prankster finds himself in a virtual game world that enables him to prank in a rather unconventional yet stylish way.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core Processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Shader Model 3.0, 256 MB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c-compatible, 16-bit
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or 8 Processor: 2.0 GHz Quad Core Processor Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Shader Model 3.0, 512 MB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c-compatible, 16-bit
